If you get Kablowey-ed, you're eliminated.
When one team has all the flags, game's over.
Now, let's play some Kablowey!
-[Allison] Big Blue! Big Blue! -[all] What? What?
-[Allison] Break it down. -[all] What?
Okay.
That's enough of that. That's a little awkward for everyone.

Get your team's flag and protect it like it's tots!
On the count of three, I want you to charge!
Three, two…
Wait. No, I screwed that up. Sorry.
One, two…
-three! -[screaming]
Mom's our strongest enemy.
Let's go get her!
Don't worry about red. My husband's on defense.

translation.ko: 그린 팀도 괜찮아요, 케이티는 아빠를 노릴 거예요, 뛰어요!

translation.en: Okay, guys. Okay, just… Defense is the key. Okay?
Wait out here. Let them eliminate each other. I know what I'm doing.

translation.ko: 가요! 아빠 팀인 레드 팀 먼저!

You with the hair thing, outta here!
You in the headband, you're out!
The other headband. [whistles]
-Should we take a selfie? -Yeah, sure.
-Sweet. -Tag me on Insta, 'kay?
-One, two, three. Insatiable Island! -Yeah!
Red team, what are you doing? It's a bloodbath!
translation.ko: 레드 팀, 뭐 하는 거죠? 대학살입니다

translation.en: Half your team is eliminated!
Hold on. Change of strategy. Run for your life. Billy, get out of here!
translation.ko: - 잠깐, 작전 수정! 얼른 도망쳐요 - 빌리! 도망쳐

translation.ko: 난 아침에 맡는 쿨에이드 냄새가 좋아

[whistles] You're out!
Too many casualties! Go back! Fall back!
Fall back, team!
New strategy.
Ma'am. Hi, my name's Eric.
-I'm here to make muscles, not friends. -I'm more shredded. Check this out.
translation.ko: - 전 여기 몸 만들러 왔어요 - 제가 더 몸 좋아요, 보세요

translation.en: I have a very relatable body. It's great for TV.
translation.ko: 전 좀 더 공감 가는 몸매죠 카메라 잘 받아요

translation.en: For TV. Insatiable Island. Put your clothes on.
We're getting killed. I need that bag.
Load me up with ammo!
-Get her ammo! -Bring it!
Blue, who wiped your bottoms when you were babies?
translation.ko: 블루 팀, 여러분이 아기 때 누가 기저귀를 갈아 줬죠?

translation.en: -My mom! -Our moms!
-Who tied your shoes when you were babies? -Our moms!
translation.ko: 어릴 때 신발 끈을 묶어 준 사람은? 엄마입니다!

translation.en: Fight for your mom!
-Go, Blue! -Go, Blue!
Nando, look out!
Nice job, Commander Ellie.
Yay!
You're out!
Go!
Do you see them?
Destroy my beautiful children!
You are going down!
[Katie] Oh, this is bad.
You wanted to make me a warrior?
I'm a warrior!
Listen, I think we need to team up to take her out.
Deal.
Is that fair?
All's fair in love and Kablowey.
Go for it.
That was perfect. It's messing her up.
-Yeah. -Are you playing dirty, Nando?
[Nando] I don't see her. Where is she?
Do you see which way she went?
[Nando] No, I didn't. Let's go.
Mom!
Yeah!
[coach] Oh wow! You got Kablowey-ed.
-Ah! -[coach] Ha-ha! You're done!
Mrs. Torres got the red flag!
If she gets the green flag, she wins!
-How'd you let that happen? -What?
Hey, Brian, can I use your phone for a sec?
I just gotta deal with a work thing.
Will you put in a good word with your wife?
Sure.
Wait. Hold up. Hold up.
Mom, come on. It's over. You don't even have any balloons left.

translation.en: [in Spanish] Then why is there fear in your eyes, daughter?
translation.ko: 그런데 왜 눈에는 두려움이 가득하지, 딸?

translation.en: [in Spanish] No, no, you have more fear.
translation.ko: 아니 엄마 눈에 더 두려움이 가득해요

translation.en: -[screams] -Wait!
That's my mom! That's my mom!
Whoo! We did it!
[in Spanish] Blue forever!
[in English] Yeah!
We shipped the nano-cams? We don't have clearance yet.

translation.en: Tell Alan to issue a recall.
-[Ellie] Daddy? -Honey.
-Were you talking on a phone? -No. Phone? No, no.
I was just out here looking at… Taking in the nature. I love nature.
translation.ko: 그냥 자연을 들여다보고 있었어 아빠는 자연 좋아하거든

translation.en: -Well, it looked like you were. -Nope, I wasn't.
translation.ko: 통화하는 거 같던데 아니, 그렇지 않아

translation.en: -No. -Daddy, do you hear that?
-What? -It must be coming from that bush.
Oh, she fell out of her nest.
Yeah.
We have to put her back.
-What? -I thought you loved nature.
Yeah, honey, but it's a very tall tree.
If you help the birdie, Daddy,
I won't tell anyone I saw you talking on a phone.
Wait, wait. Ah. [grunts]
[Ellie] Come on, Daddy! Hurry up!
Oh, they're a family again, honey.
Yay, Daddy!
It was actually a good idea, honey. Thank you.
[screams] What's this?
She thinks you're stealing her babies!
We were just trying to help!
Allison, baby!
Allison!
-[Ellie] Come down, Daddy! -I'm coming down, honey!
Ooh. You okay, Daddy?
Yeah, honey.
I'm okay. I'm okay. I'm okay.
I'm okay.
Oh my God! Stop!
Stop! Call your mom!
See? I'm not always a fun killer.
Well, not today you aren't.
Mom, there's no way you'll make it through the day.
-I'm still saying yes, aren't I? -[Carlos] Call 911!
translation.ko: - 아직 '안 돼' 한 적 없잖아 - 119 불러

translation.en: -Allison! -Is that Dad?
Yup, that's him.
Your brother's taking you to get dry ice, right?
We're good. By the way, so many people are coming tonight.
translation.ko: 응, 그리고 말인데 오늘 밤에 진짜 사람 많이 와

translation.en: It's gonna be awesome.
[Nando] Fantastic.
Are you sure you need that much baking soda?
Yeah, it's a better catalyst.
Trust me. I'm an expert on catalysts now.

translation.en: -Allison! Call 911! -I'll have to call you right back.
Call 911!
We need a doctor, stat! There's been a horrific bird attack.
translation.ko: 당직의 호출! 야생 새로 인한 심각한 외상이다

translation.en: What? Do I have rabies?
No, this hospital sucks, so I exaggerated a little to goose 'em. No pun intended.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 이 병원 사람들 느려터져서 좀 빨리 움직이게 하려는 거예요

translation.en: -She's kidding. You're kidding, right? -Sure.
Here's a waiting room.
-Katie, you are in charge. -Okay.
Everybody stay with her, so I can find you later.
translation.ko: 다들 케이티랑 있어 이따가 엄마도 갈게

translation.en: -Hurry up! Hurry up! Hurry up! -Stay. It's okay.
Okay, Mr. Torres, you can relax.
The scratches are superficial. You'll be fine.
Oh good. So no concussion, no rabies, no bruises? He's good to go?
translation.ko: 그럼 뇌진탕도, 광견병도 아니고 멍도 없으니 가도 되죠?

translation.en: He's in the clear.
-I'll send in a nurse to discharge you. -Thank you.
-You're okay. That's great. -Yeah.
I will get the kids, and you take your time.
Honey, I hate to be a party pooper, but my body's done.
translation.ko: 여보, 김빠지게 하긴 싫은데 난 체력 다했어

translation.en: Can we finish this another day, please?
translation.ko: 나머지는 다른 날 하면 안 될까?

translation.en: Really?
Yeah.
Yeah, I guess if you're not feeling well, of course we'll go home.
translation.ko: 그래, 몸이 안 좋으면 당연히 집에 가야지

translation.en: -Thank you. -[Allison] Gosh.
Maybe I'll pop by the office, then go home and crash.
translation.ko: 사무실 잠깐 들렀다가 집에 가서 자야겠어

translation.en: -Sorry. What'd you say? -Hm?
Maybe I'll pop by the office.
So you don't feel well enough to finish this day for our family,
translation.ko: 그러니까 몸이 안 좋아서 우리 가족 행사는 함께 못 해도

translation.en: but you do feel well enough to pop by the office.
It's a little crisis that happened this morning.
translation.ko: 아침에 일어났던 그 위기 사태 때문이야

translation.en: Carlos, you want to cancel this day, that's your choice,
translation.ko: 칼로스, 예스 데이를 물리고 싶다면 마음대로 해

translation.en: but you're telling the kids.
[in Spanish] It's your turn to be the bad guy.
Oh, Mrs. T. Hey, get this.
I told Karen I'd give her a Yes Day, and she doesn't even want it.
We have an ambulance with a siren.
Think of the possibilities.
Grow up, Jean. Seriously.
How about you lighten up, Karen?
Take a chill pill.
Are you okay?
Yeah, I… I just got into a fight with my husband.
Ah, and you want me to beat him up?
No, nothing like that.
[Jean] Give him a wedgie?
No, no. It's just that today was the first day in, like, a year

translation.en: where I felt like we were really in it together.
-[Jean] Yeah. -And then he just had to go and be a wuss.
Sounds like Karen.
She's mad because I took our life savings and bought a fleet of ambulances.
translation.ko: 우리가 평생 모은 돈으로 구급차 여러 대 질렀다고 화났죠

translation.en: I barely know how to drive this one.
translation.ko: 물론 제가 몰 줄 모르긴 해요

translation.en: But you can't force people to change.
You gotta do what works for you,

translation.en: That's so true.
Hey, guys.
Honey, can I talk to you for a second?
Yeah.
Look, I… I feel real bad.
I don't want to be the spoiler here.
Well, don't feel bad. You are not the spoiler. You do you.

Okay?
Hey guys, let me see what you got. Big ask number four. Let me see.

That'd be very cool. We'd have a great time.
But it does not compare

-What? -Whoo!
But wait. What about the distance rule?
I've decided to make an exception.
And your dad has something he wants to say.
Go ahead, Dad.
Well, guys, I'm feeling, um…
I'm… I'm feeling a little…
I'm feeling a little bit sick.
You're sick?
Are you going home?
I think I might be coming down with Magic Mountain fever!
translation.ko: 병에 걸린 것 같구나 매직 마운틴 열병!

translation.en: -But how are we gonna get there? -Yeah.
Because the SUV is at the Kablowey field, and even with traffic, it'll take forever.
translation.ko: SUV는 카블로위 경기장에 있고 차도 막히니 한참 걸릴 텐데요

translation.en: Uh, duh. It's Yes Day!
Are we ready for some roller coaster madness?
-Yes! -Yeah!
Just so we're clear, if an emergency comes in,
I gotta leave you on the side of the road.
-What if we're the emergency? -Oh God.
[chuckles] Good one.
[Jean] Oh boy. Hold on.
All right, you guys can make fun of me if you want, but I brought clean clothes.
translation.ko: 다들 날 비웃겠지만 깨끗한 옷도 챙겨왔어

translation.en: -Oh my gosh! -Just in case!
-Thank you so much, Mom. -That is a nice mom.
I know you hate when I dress you. I took a stab.
translation.ko: 엄마가 고른 옷 싫어하지만 어쩔 수 없어

translation.en: Beats smelling like Kool-Aid, so…
It's Magic Mountain, baby!
[Carlos] Eyes on the road, please.
[Jean] Got it. My bad.
[Jean] Attention, park visitors.
The Torres family is here for this Yes Day,
translation.ko: 예스 데이를 맞아 토레스 가족이 왔습니다

translation.en: and I want you to say yes and you to say yes. That is right.
translation.ko: 여기 이분도, 저기 저분도 다 같이 '예스'를 외쳐요

translation.en: It's all about those yeses, so get ready for some fun!
Okay, guys. Can someone bring me a snack?
You gotta say yes.
No, no, no, no, no, no, no.
Why did I say yes to this, Katie? [screams]
Okay.
-Great. There you go, honey. -Thank you.
It's really nice to get out of the house, with everyone.

translation.en: And we have to do it more 'cause you are growing up.
translation.ko: 너 어른 되기 전에 자주 이래야지

translation.en: We have to take advantage.
I'm gonna get cotton candy. You want some?
No. Thanks, honey.
-Oh, hey, Katie. Your… Your… -[chimes]
Great.
I need you to text Layla right away
that her cousin isn't taking you to Fleekfest. Your mother is.
translation.ko: 걔 사촌 말고 네 엄마가 플릭 축제에 갈 거라고 해

translation.en: What?
-Stay here with your sister. Okay? -Okay.
translation.ko: - 동생 잘 데리고 있어, 알겠지? - 네

translation.en: She's trying to hook you up with some older guys.
-Why were you checking my phone? -You left it there.
translation.ko: - 남의 휴대폰은 왜 봐요? - 두고 간 건 너야

translation.en: You're overreacting because I can't control what Layla sends.
translation.ko: 과민 반응하지 마세요 문자 보낸 건 레일라예요

translation.en: She was responding to a text you sent. "Guys at my school are so boring."
translation.ko: 네가 이렇게 보냈으니 답장하지 '우리 학교 남자들은 너무 지루해'

translation.en: You were snooping.
Once I saw the picture, yeah, I opened your phone.
translation.ko: 그래, 이 사진 보고 뒤져 봤다

translation.en: Dad, can you please back me up here?
I know you want your independence. I get that I'm the bummer,
translation.ko: 독립하고 싶다는 건 알아 엄만 김 팍팍 새게 하지

translation.en: but let me be clear, Katie.
If I don't take you to the concert tonight, you aren't going.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤 콘서트에 엄마랑 안 가면 넌 못 가

translation.en: -I'm done with Yes Day. I'm done. -Oh, well, you're grounded.
translation.ko: - 예스 데이 그만할래요 - 좋아, 외출 금지다

translation.en: I can't believe I let you fool me into thinking you actually changed.
You really don't trust me.
It isn't about trust. It's about being your parent.
translation.ko: 믿고 말고의 문제가 아니야 부모 노릇을 하는 거지

translation.en: Please, give me a break.
What's happening is I don't need you anymore, and you can't handle it.
translation.ko: 더는 엄마 필요 없다는 사실을 못 받아들이시는 거잖아요

translation.en: [Carlos, in Spanish] Katerina.
Enough.
Take your siblings to the carousel.
[in English] Go now.
[Katie] Guys, come on.
-[Nando] Where are we going? -[Katie] Carousel.
[Nando] This is the best day ever!
-Yay! -Yay! -Yay! -Yay! -[Ellie] Yay! -Yay!
Don't you guys get it?
Mom and Dad are just using this day to take control of us.
translation.ko: 엄마 아빠는 이날을 이용해 우릴 통제하는 거야

translation.en: They think by giving us a Yes Day,
we'll do what they want for the rest of our lives.
translation.ko: 다른 날에 우리가 뭐든 시키는 대로 하니까

translation.en: Nuh-uh.
Yeah, nuh-uh.
It's all a big con.
If today's just a big con, I hope I get conned for the rest of my life.
Yeah. Me too.
Cardinal rule. I shouldn't have looked at her phone.
translation.ko: 휴대폰을 보면 안 된다는 건 기본인데!

translation.en: No wonder she was mad.
But it was right there, and there was a picture of a boy.
translation.ko: 하지만 남자애 사진이 떡 하고 뜨잖아

translation.en: Ugh, I hate when she hates me.
She doesn't hate you. She's just individuating.
translation.ko: 미워하는 게 아니라 당신을 그렇게 판단한 거야

translation.en: Individuating? It's annoying.
I just hope she understands that it all comes from a place of love.
translation.ko: 다 사랑해서 그런 거라는 걸 이해하면 좋겠어

translation.en: -I know. -Don't you?
She's just our little girl.
She's not that little.
Look at that gorilla.
It looks like the one Katie used to walk around with.
translation.ko: 케이티가 들고 다니던 고릴라 인형과 똑같다

translation.en: She called him "Mr. Golilla."
[Carlos] Oh yeah, I remember it got really filthy.
Well, yeah, it had its own car seat.
We took it everywhere,
and she was so cute with her pigtails
and her overalls and a heart on the pocket.
Yeah.
Back when she loved me and was my little buddy.
translation.ko: 그때는 날 사랑했고 나만의 꼬마 딸이었어

translation.en: I know.
-What do you say? You wanna play? -No, it's fine. Thank you.
Carlos, I wanna play. I'm gonna win Katie that gorilla.
translation.ko: 칼로스, 할래 저 고릴라 타서 줄 거야

translation.en: -Then she won't be mean to me. -You sure?
-Hi. -Hi.
I would like to win that, please.
You'll have to beat this nice lady.
Oh, okay. Hi. How are you?
I need to win this pink gorilla for my daughter, Katie. We're in a fight.
translation.ko: 내 딸 케이티를 위해 분홍색 고릴라를 타려고요, 붙어요

translation.en: [scoffs] What if… What if I want to win that gorilla?
I already have the blue and brown gorillas.
Now I need a pink one.
Oh. Well, just go easy on me, okay? Just, girl code.
translation.ko: 그럼 살살 해줘요, 알겠죠? 여자끼리 눈치 알잖아요

translation.en: -Katie's not five years old anymore, okay? -I know she's not.
When she sees the gorilla,
she'll know I'm her mama and remember everything I've done for her.
translation.ko: 내가 엄마라는 걸 알고 그간 받았던 걸 기억해낼 거야

translation.en: All right, ready?
-I think that we should go. -Don't distract me. I'm on a mission.
translation.ko: 여보, 그냥 가자 방해하지 말아 줘, 임무 중이거든

translation.en: Ready?
-[bell rings] -[woman] Toss!
You're going down, lady.
Ooh, it's so close!
This is for driving her retainer three hours to camp.
This is for peeing every time I sneeze.
-Will you be quiet? -Okay, let's be good sports.
This is for making me sleep-train you three times.
Shut up!
-It's for my daughter, Katie! -[woman 2] Quiet!
translation.ko: - 내 딸 케이티를 위해 딸 거야 - 조용!

translation.en: I did it. Don't mess with Mama.
No. No, no.
I won.
What? I just won. I've never won anything. I just won.
translation.ko: 네? 내가 이겼죠 평생 처음으로 이겨봤다고요

translation.en: No, I won by, like, a nose.
Come on. We all saw it. She won.
It was me. I won.
-[Allison] Miss Cheetah? -What?
Can you tell her that I clearly won? I was like a sniper.
translation.ko: 내가 이겼다고 말해 줄래요? 저격수처럼 덤볐는데

translation.en: I am a freaking sniper, okay?
-No, you are not. I won that gorilla! -Honey!
-I'm staying out of this. -[Carlos] It's not worth it!
translation.ko: - 난 빠질래요 - 앨리슨, 이럴 필요 없잖아

translation.en: This is my gorilla!
[woman 2] You cheating suburban soccer mom!
Hey! No, don't do this! I got tickets here. Play again, okay?
translation.ko: 이러지 말고 표 있으니까 다시 붙어요, 네?

translation.en: I shouldn't have to win it again. You're a lawyer. You know about justice!
